assetProfile.address2: Plot No.1&2, F-0, Ground Floor Ishwar Nagar Mathura Road
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Globus Spirits Limited manufactures and sells alcohol in India. It offers Indian made Indian liquor products under the Nimboo, Narangi, Goldee, Ghoomar, and Heer Ranjha brands; and Indian made foreign liquor products under the County Club, French Castle, Hannibal Legendary, and White Lace brands. The company is also involved in franchise bottling and bulk alcohol hand sanitizer production activities. It also exports its products to Western Europe, Western Africa, and Southern African countries. Globus Spirits Limited was founded in 1992 and is based in New Delhi, India.
